Class SKPulseAnimationSettings

  • java.lang.Object

      • getSpan

        public float getSpan()
        Gets the pulse animation span. Default value is 2.
        Returns:

      • setSpan

        public void setSpan(float span)
        Sets the pulse animation span. The size of the animation by multiplying it by the current position image size. For example if span value is set to 3, the animation size will be three times bigger than the current position image size. Default value is 2.
        Parameters:
        span -
